ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisPROHIBITION OF CERTAIN TOXIC SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS, 2003 which replace the Regulations made in 1996 and add benzidine and its salt to the existing list of prohibited substances, as well as hexachlorobenzene.
